channel.title: Publications :: VMC
channel.description: This chapter lists the presentations & publication related to VMC. Publications List

item.title: Publications List
item.description: Please refer to the paper below when publishing results base on simulations with VMC: Info Reference paper Hřivnáčová I et al: The Virtual MonteCarlo, ECONF C0303241:THJT006,2003; e-Print: cs.SE/0306005 All publications listed in time reversed order: New Developments in the VMC Project, I Hřivnáčová, B Volkel 2020 EPJ Web Conf. Volume 245 02005 doi: 10.1051/epjconf/202024502005 Using multiple engines in the Virtual Monte Carlo package, B Volkel et al 2020 EPJ Web Conf. Volume 245 02008 doi: 10.1051/epjconf/202024502008

item.title: Meetings (Old)
item.description: VMC meeting, CERN, 03 June 2009 VMC meeting, CERN, 04 February 2009 VMC Open issues meeting, CERN, 22 September 2008 VMC Workshop, CERN, 29-30th November 2004
